Title: Chain of Fools
Actors: Steve Zahn, Salma Hayek, Jeff Goldblum, Elijah Wood
Plot: "Chain of Fools" is a heist comedy-romance about a hapless barber whose life takes a turn for the worse when he ends up in possession of a stolen treasure of ancient coins (the "Shiny New Enemies") and simultaneously falls on the wrong side of the law and in love with the detective investigating the crime.
Production: Bel Air Entertainment, Lord-Weaver, City Block Productions Inc.
